trans-unit.target: 資料讀取`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個記錄或位元組繼上次`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。

trans-unit.source: When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 時自檔案讀取，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案來判斷內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能無法 Visual Basic 來源檔案。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在讀取資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取的資料錄長度界限中後續的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the starting of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法判斷填補資料的數量，與任何確定性，通常是最好的是，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。

trans-unit.source: By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果變數是一個字串，`FileGet`讀取兩個位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並再讀取變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版支援固定長度字串。置入檔案時，不寫入長度描述元。

trans-unit.source: If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要讀取的描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數是陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度屬性的描述元。

trans-unit.source: To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫的描述元，設定`ArrayIsDynamic`參數`True`。

trans-unit.source: When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written.
trans-unit.target: 當讀取陣列，您必須符合陣列寫入的方式。

trans-unit.source: If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 如果它具有描述元寫入，您必須讀取的描述元。

trans-unit.source: If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`決定要讀取的內容。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時寫入磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The 218 bytes are distributed as follows:
trans-unit.target: 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 * 2)
trans-unit.target: 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 * 2)

trans-unit.source: 200 bytes for the data: (5 * 10 * 4).
If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數讀入是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。

trans-unit.source: `FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (使用撰寫`FilePut`) 加上其長度等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別項目所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: This includes any arrays and their descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 這包括任何的陣列，其描述元。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示當寫入字串的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式會套用規則，但有些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode:
trans-unit.target: 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式不同的規則`Random`模式：

trans-unit.source: The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect.
trans-unit.target: `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: `FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records.
trans-unit.target: `FileGet` 連續; 從磁碟讀取所有變數也就是說，無需之間的填補的記錄。

trans-unit.source: For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data.
trans-unit.target: 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。

trans-unit.source: No descriptor is read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有描述元是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: `FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor.
trans-unit.target: `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構不會預期雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 從檔案讀取使用`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 and not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: File mode is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 檔案模式無效。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name into which data is read.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which reading starts.
trans-unit.target: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.
trans-unit.target: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FileGetObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FileGetObject" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: The `FileGetObject` function is used instead of `FileGet` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is returned instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: `FileGetObject`而不是使用函式`FileGet`若要避免模稜兩可在編譯時期，如果型別`Object`傳回而不是另一個類型，例如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FileGetObject` is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要寫出`Variant`型別，`FileGetObject`需要。

trans-unit.source: When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, it is always suggested that you use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`.
trans-unit.target: 有疑問，如果您使用物件的第二個參數，都建議您使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。

trans-unit.source: `FileGetObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FileGetObject` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data read with `FileGetObject` is usually written with `FilePutObject`.
trans-unit.target: 資料讀取`FileGetObject`通常寫入`FilePutObject`。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FileGetObject` reads the record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function).
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`，`FileGetObject`最後一個之後讀取的記錄或位元組`FileGetObject`或`FilePutObject`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式)。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGetObject` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在讀取資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGetObject`讀取的資料錄長度界限中後續的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the beginning of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾及開頭的下一筆記錄之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read.
trans-unit.target: 因為填補資料的數量無法精確判斷，所以最好能夠符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being read into is a string, by default `FileGetObject` reads a two-byte descriptor containing the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 讀取變數是否為字串，預設`FileGetObject`讀取包含字串長度的兩個位元組描述元，並再讀取變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings and when read to a file, the length descriptor is not written.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版支援固定長度字串和讀取檔案時，長度的描述項不會寫入。

trans-unit.source: If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要讀取的描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being read into is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 如果被讀入變數是陣列，則記錄所指定的長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions.
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目： 2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時磁碟：

trans-unit.source: The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: 18 bytes for the descriptor (2 + 8 * 2), and 100 bytes for the data (5 * 10 * 4).
trans-unit.target: 218 位元組會分散，如下所示： 18 個位元組 (2 + 8 * 2)，描述元 100 個位元組 (5 * 10 * 4) 的資料。

trans-unit.source: `FileGetObject` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FileGetObject` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePutObject`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions.
trans-unit.target: 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (使用撰寫`FilePutObject`) 加上其長度等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元： 2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements, including any arrays and their descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目，包括任何的陣列，其描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute> class can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute>類別可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Binary` mode, all of the `Random` rules apply, with these exceptions:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，所有的`Random`套用規則，但有下列例外：

trans-unit.source: The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect.
trans-unit.target: `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: `FileGetObject` reads all variables from disk contiguously, that is, with no padding between records.
trans-unit.target: `FileGetObject` 所有連續讀取變數，從磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。

trans-unit.source: For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGetObject` reads only the data.
trans-unit.target: 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGetObject`讀取的資料。

trans-unit.source: No descriptor is read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有描述元是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: `FileGetObject` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor.
trans-unit.target: `FileGetObject` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構不會預期雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 時自檔案讀取，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案來判斷內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能無法 Visual Basic 來源檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads a record into a test file and then retrieves it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取記錄，到測試檔案，並接著會擷取它。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" /> expression that specifies a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定檔案的 <see langword="String" /> 運算式。

trans-unit.source: <c>PathName</c> may include the directory or folder, and the drive.
trans-unit.target: <c>PathName</c> 可包含目錄或資料夾及磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="Long" /> value that specifies the length of a file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="Long" /> 值，指定檔案的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FileLen" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FileLen" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.GetFileInfo(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.GetFileInfo(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Long" /> value that specifies the length of a file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Long" /> 指定檔案長度的值 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file is open when the `FileLen` function is called, the value returned represents the size of the file at the time it was opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案時，開啟`FileLen`函式呼叫，傳回的值代表在它已開啟檔案的大小。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current length of an open file, use the `LOF` function.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前已開啟的檔案的長度，請使用`LOF`函式。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `FileLen` function to return the length of a file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`FileLen`函數來傳回檔案的長度，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: For purposes of this example, assume that `TestFile` is a file that contains some data.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的目的，假設`TestFile`是包含某些資料的檔案。

trans-unit.source: File does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see langword="FreeFile" /> function to obtain the next available file number.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FreeFile" /> 函式取得下一個可用的檔案編號。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" /> expression that specifies a file name—may include directory or folder, and drive.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" /> 運算式，可指定檔名，也可能包括目錄或資料夾及磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration specifying the file mode: <see langword="Append" />, <see langword="Binary" />, <see langword="Input" />, <see langword="Output" />, or <see langword="Random" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定檔案模式的列舉類型：<see langword="Append" />、<see langword="Binary" />、<see langword="Input" />、<see langword="Output" /> 或 <see langword="Random" />

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenMode" /> .
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenMode" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration specifying the operations permitted on the open file: <see langword="Read" />, <see langword="Write" />, or <see langword="ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定開啟檔案上允許的作業之列舉類型：<see langword="Read" />、<see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to <see langword="ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenAccess" /> .
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration specifying the operations not permitted on the open file by other processes: <see langword="Shared" />, <see langword="Lock Read" />, <see langword="Lock Write" />, and <see langword="Lock Read Write" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定開啟的檔案上其他處理序不允許之作業的列舉類型：<see langword="Shared" />、<see langword="Lock Read" />、<see langword="Lock Write" /> 和 <see langword="Lock Read Write" />。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to <see langword="Lock Read Write" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Lock Read Write" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenShare" /> .
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.OpenShare" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Number less than or equal to 32,767 (bytes).
trans-unit.target: 數字小於或等於 32,767 (位元組)。

trans-unit.source: For files opened for random access, this value is the record length.
trans-unit.target: 對於為隨機存取開啟的檔案而言，這個值是資料錄長度。

trans-unit.source: For sequential files, this value is the number of characters buffered.
trans-unit.target: 對於循序檔案而言，這個值是緩衝的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Opens a file for input or output.
trans-unit.target: 開啟要當做輸入或輸出的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FileOpen" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FileOpen" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: The `FileOpen` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance.
trans-unit.target: `FileOpen`函式提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。

trans-unit.source: For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance.
trans-unit.target: 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Visual Basic 檔案存取](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。

trans-unit.source: You must open a file before any I/O operation can be performed on it.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先開啟檔案，才能在其上執行任何的 I/O 作業。

trans-unit.source: `FileOpen` allocates a buffer for I/O to the file and determines the mode of access to use with the buffer.
trans-unit.target: `FileOpen` 會針對 I/O 配置緩衝區至檔案，並判斷要使用之緩衝區的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: When writing to a file, an application may have to create a file, if the file to which it is trying to write does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入檔案時，應用程式可能要建立檔案，如果嘗試寫入的檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: To do so, it needs permission for the directory in which the file is to be created.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，需要的權限的 建立檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: However, if the file specified by `FileName` does exist, the application needs `Write` permission only to the file itself.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果所指定的檔案`FileName`確實存在，應用程式需求`Write`權限只檔案本身。

trans-unit.source: Wherever possible, to help improve security, create the file during deployment and grant `Write` permission to that file only, instead of to the whole directory.
trans-unit.target: 盡量，以協助改善安全性，在部署和授與建立檔案的任一處`Write`該檔案的權限唯一的而不是整個目錄。

trans-unit.source: To help improve security, write data to user directories instead of to the root directory or the Program Files directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要改善安全性，請將資料寫入使用者目錄而不是根目錄或 Program Files 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The channel to open can be found by using the `FreeFile()` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟頻道可以找到使用`FreeFile()`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `FileOpen` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration, which may affect its execution in partial trust situations.
trans-unit.target: `FileOpen`函式需要`Read`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別，這可能會影響在部分信任情況下執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates various uses of the `FileOpen` function to enable input and output to a file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例說明的各種用法`FileOpen`函式會啟用輸入和輸出至檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code opens the file `TestFile` in `Input` mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會開啟檔案`TestFile`中`Input`模式。

trans-unit.source: This example opens the file in `Binary` mode for writing operations only.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會開啟中的檔案`Binary`模式只允許寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example opens the file in `Random` mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會開啟中的檔案`Random`模式。

trans-unit.source: The file contains records of the structure `Person`.
trans-unit.target: 檔案包含結構的記錄`Person`。

trans-unit.source: This code example opens the file in `Output` mode; any process can read or write to file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會開啟中的檔案`Output`模式; 任何處理程序可以讀取或寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code example opens the file in `Binary` mode for reading; other processes cannot read file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會開啟中的檔案`Binary`模式進行讀取; 其他處理序無法讀取檔案。

trans-unit.source: Record length is negative (and not equal to -1).
trans-unit.target: 資料錄的長度為負數 (而且不等於 -1)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="FileName" /> is already open, or <paramref name="FileName" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="FileName" /> 已經開啟，或 <paramref name="FileName" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FilePut" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: F For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which writing starts.
trans-unit.target: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FilePut" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個記錄或最後一個之後位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式。

trans-unit.source: The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length.
trans-unit.target: `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 引數時，不會寫入長度描述元`True`。

trans-unit.source: If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`與`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入的資料錄長度界限上。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法判斷填補資料的數量，與任何確定性，通常是最好的是有相符的資料寫入的記錄長度。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述項，其中包含字串長度，並再寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是物件所包含的數字類型，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`的物件，然後將變數。

trans-unit.source: For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，寫入物件時，包含整數，`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 以及包含資料的四個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是物件，包含字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組的描述元識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示字串，然後再寫入字串資料的長度的兩個位元組描述元。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須為至少四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該將`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是陣列，您必須選擇要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版撰寫為動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述元。

trans-unit.source: To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫的描述元，設定`ArrayIsDynamic`參數`True`。

trans-unit.source: When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入陣列，您必須符合的方式，將會讀取陣列;如果將讀取與描述元，您必須撰寫的描述元。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時寫入磁碟。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於寫入資料的長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別，但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk,
trans-unit.target: 字串有更多的位元組，超過所指定的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式會套用規則，但有些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode:
trans-unit.target: 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式不同的規則`Random`模式：

trans-unit.source: The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect.
trans-unit.target: `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。

trans-unit.source: For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data.
trans-unit.target: 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。

trans-unit.source: No descriptor is written.
trans-unit.target: 會不寫入任何描述項。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 寫入可變長度的字串不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:

trans-unit.source: Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式將資料寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 結構的五筆記錄`Person`寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 and not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: File mode is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 檔案模式無效。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which writing starts.
trans-unit.target: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FilePut" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個記錄或最後一個之後位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式。

trans-unit.source: The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length.
trans-unit.target: `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 引數時，不會寫入長度描述元`True`。

trans-unit.source: If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`與`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入的資料錄長度界限上。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法判斷填補資料的數量，與任何確定性，通常是最好的是有相符的資料寫入的記錄長度。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述項，其中包含字串長度，並再寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是物件所包含的數字類型，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`的物件，然後將變數。

trans-unit.source: For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，寫入物件時，包含整數，`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 以及包含資料的四個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是物件，包含字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組的描述元識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示字串，然後再寫入字串資料的長度的兩個位元組描述元。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須為至少四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該將`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是陣列，您必須選擇要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版撰寫為動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述元。

trans-unit.source: To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫的描述元，設定`ArrayIsDynamic`參數`True`。

trans-unit.source: When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入陣列，您必須符合的方式，將會讀取陣列;如果將讀取與描述元，您必須撰寫的描述元。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時寫入磁碟。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於寫入資料的長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別，但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk,
trans-unit.target: 字串有更多的位元組，超過所指定的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式會套用規則，但有些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode:
trans-unit.target: 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式不同的規則`Random`模式：

trans-unit.source: The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect.
trans-unit.target: `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。

trans-unit.source: For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data.
trans-unit.target: 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。

trans-unit.source: No descriptor is written.
trans-unit.target: 會不寫入任何描述項。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 寫入可變長度的字串不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:

trans-unit.source: Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式將資料寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 結構的五筆記錄`Person`寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 and not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: File mode is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 檔案模式無效。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which writing starts.
trans-unit.target: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FilePut" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個記錄或最後一個之後位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式。

trans-unit.source: The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length.
trans-unit.target: `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 引數時，不會寫入長度描述元`True`。

trans-unit.source: If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`與`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入的資料錄長度界限上。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法判斷填補資料的數量，與任何確定性，通常是最好的是有相符的資料寫入的記錄長度。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述項，其中包含字串長度，並再寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是物件所包含的數字類型，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`的物件，然後將變數。

trans-unit.source: For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，寫入物件時，包含整數，`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 以及包含資料的四個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是物件，包含字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組的描述元識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示字串，然後再寫入字串資料的長度的兩個位元組描述元。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須為至少四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該將`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是陣列，您必須選擇要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版撰寫為動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述元。

trans-unit.source: To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫的描述元，設定`ArrayIsDynamic`參數`True`。

trans-unit.source: When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入陣列，您必須符合的方式，將會讀取陣列;如果將讀取與描述元，您必須撰寫的描述元。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時寫入磁碟。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於寫入資料的長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別，但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk,
trans-unit.target: 字串有更多的位元組，超過所指定的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式會套用規則，但有些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode:
trans-unit.target: 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式不同的規則`Random`模式：

trans-unit.source: The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect.
trans-unit.target: `RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。

trans-unit.source: For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data.
trans-unit.target: 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。

trans-unit.source: No descriptor is written.
trans-unit.target: 會不寫入任何描述項。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 寫入可變長度的字串不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:

trans-unit.source: Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式將資料寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 結構的五筆記錄`Person`寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 and not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: File mode is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 檔案模式無效。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which writing starts.
trans-unit.target: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.
trans-unit.target: 相較於 <see langword="FilePut" />，<see langword="My" /> 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem" />。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組是在位置 1，第二個記錄或位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個記錄或最後一個之後位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式。

trans-unit.source: The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length.
trans-unit.target: `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 引數時，不會寫入長度描述元`True`。

trans-unit.source: If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`與`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。

trans-unit.source: Random Mode
trans-unit.target: 隨機模式

trans-unit.source: For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Random`模式中，則適用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入的資料錄長度界限上。

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以現有的內容，將檔案緩衝區的填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法判斷填補資料的數量，與任何確定性，通常是最好的是有相符的資料寫入的記錄長度。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述項，其中包含字串長度，並再寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是物件所包含的數字類型，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`的物件，然後將變數。

trans-unit.source: For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，寫入物件時，包含整數，`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 以及包含資料的四個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是物件，包含字串，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組的描述元識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示字串，然後再寫入字串資料的長度的兩個位元組描述元。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須為至少四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。

trans-unit.source: If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該將`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，且您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入的變數是陣列，您必須選擇要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 及舊版撰寫為動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述元。

trans-unit.source: To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫的描述元，設定`ArrayIsDynamic`參數`True`。

trans-unit.source: When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入陣列，您必須符合的方式，將會讀取陣列;如果將讀取與描述元，您必須撰寫的描述元。

trans-unit.source: The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank.
trans-unit.target: 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。

trans-unit.source: Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions).
trans-unit.target: 其長度等於 2 加上 8 時間維度的數目: (2 + 8 * NumberOfDimensions)。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於撰寫陣列資料和陣列描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陣列宣告需要 218 位元組陣列寫入時寫入磁碟。

trans-unit.source: If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。

trans-unit.source: The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的資料錄長度`RecordLength`中的子句`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於寫入資料的長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別，但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk.
trans-unit.target: `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk,
trans-unit.target: 字串有更多的位元組，超過所指定的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，

trans-unit.source: Binary Mode
trans-unit.target: 二進位模式

trans-unit.target: 在 開啟檔案的`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式會套用規則，但有些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:

trans-unit.target: 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式將資料寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 and not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="RecordNumber" /> < 1 且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: File mode is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 檔案模式無效。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Any valid file number.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的檔案數目。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必要。

trans-unit.source: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Record number (<see langword="Random" /> mode files) or byte number (<see langword="Binary" /> mode files) at which writing starts.
trans-unit.target: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 (<see langword="Random" /> 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 (<see langword="Binary" /> 模式檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="My" /> feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than <see langword="FilePut" />.

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode.
trans-unit.target: `FilePut` 只能在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。

trans-unit.source: Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on.

trans-unit.source: If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written.

trans-unit.source: The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length.
trans-unit.target: `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定長度。

trans-unit.source: `FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`.
